about_the_game:
A simple interactive sex game with juicy animations and graphics set in a luxurious sauna.

Choose from various sex styles and positions and do your best to make the twins cum while watching out for your stamina.

GAME DESCRIPTION

The twins (a futanari/transgender and a girl) decide to spend their time in a hot and luxurious sauna. Things get hot real fast in the sauna.

Control the sex between 2 hot and sexy twins having fun in an underground bath.
Follow the 2 sliders and keep the sex going by pressing SPACE or CLICKING THE MOUSE at the right time, to avoid the arousal level to drop or your stamina to run out, and lose the game.
Go through various sex styles and positions, to avoid the arousal level to stop increasing.

All this, in high quality, realistic animations and renderings.

FEATURES

- Image and video gallery, so you can enjoy the animations and renderings.
- HD renders and animations.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. 
The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. 
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral sex,  vaginal sex. masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
This game contains themes of lesbian sex and incest between sisters.
All characters shown in the game are over 18 years old and all sexual acts are consensual.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
